p: Prescription must be defined on 80% isodose or higher. At least 90% of the PTV should receive the prescribed dose. A coverage of < 90% of the PTV will be considered as Acceptable Deviation, and coverage of < 80% of the target volume as an unacceptable deviation. At least 90% of the GTV should receive the prescribed dose. A coverage of < 90% of the GTV will be considered as Acceptable Deviation, and coverage of < 80% of the target volume as an unacceptable deviation.
